name: masjid-map
description: Interactive map of masjids in Riyadh with reader information and audio samples
author: Nawaf

scripts.dev:restart: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml down && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up dev
scripts.build:docker: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml run --rm dev npm run build
scripts.lint:docker: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml run --rm dev npm run lint
scripts.typecheck:docker: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml run --rm dev npm run typecheck
scripts.docker:add: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml run --rm dev npm add
scripts.docker:install: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml run --rm dev npm install
scripts.docker:clean: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml down -v && docker system prune -f
